name: Memory (itch) (Gavinbot)
description:
Memory is a puzzle game where you use the Memory of your deceased twin brother to help you navigate the obstacles you face.

How it fits the theme, the theme is Two and you are able to control two characters during the game 

Assets used:

Rocks used in levels, https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/rock-and-boulders-2-694

Ambient sounds, https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=9LfEyxl_f-U&t=1s
